solution_line_template: Bella eats during the week, {bella_apples_per_day} apples/day * {days_per_week} days/week = <<{bella_apples_per_day}*{days_per_week}={bella_apples_per_week}>>{bella_apples_per_week} apples/week

Grace harvests {bella_apples_per_week} apples/week * {fraction_consumed_by_bella_denominator} = <<{bella_apples_per_week}*{fraction_consumed_by_bella_denominator}={grace_apples_per_week}>>{grace_apples_per_week} apples during the week.

Leftover after Bella eats, {grace_apples_per_week} apples/week - {bella_apples_per_week} apples/week = <<{grace_apples_per_week}-{bella_apples_per_week}={grace_leftover_per_week}>>{grace_leftover_per_week} apples/week.
After {num_weeks} weeks Grace will have {grace_leftover_per_week} apples/week * {num_weeks} weeks = <<{grace_leftover_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_apples_grace_has}>>{total_apples_grace_has} apples.
